title: World Travel Awards lands at Forte Village Resort for Europe Gala Ceremony 2015
text:
World Travel Awards lands at Forte Village Resort for Europe Gala Ceremony 2015 
Sardinia, Italy, 2nd September 2015 
World Travel Awards has arrived in Sardinia, Italy, as final preparations are put in place for the Europe Gala Ceremony 2015 . 
The red carpet ceremony will take place on September 5th, 2015, and will this year be hosted by Forte Village Resort . 
Hundreds of industry leaders from across the region will be in attendance at the Gala Ceremony, considered by many to be the hospitality event of the year. 
World Travel Awards President Graham Cooke said: “We have landed in Sardinia, Italy, for the first time and are busy preparing for our Europe Gala Ceremony this weekend. 
"I look forward to welcoming our nominees from across Europe to Forte Village Resort for what I am sure will be a spectacular evening.” 
Located in southern Sardinia, with stunning white beaches and iridescent sea waters, Forte Village Resort nestles among glorious countryside. 
A holiday offers a wealth of leisure and accommodation options for the whole family, spread over the wonderful self-contained complex, comprised of seven luxurious hotels, 21 different restaurants and a leading wellness centre. 
Forte Village Managing Director Lorenzo Giannuzzi added: “We are excited to be hosting the World Travel Awards Europe Gala Ceremony and very much looking forward to welcoming all the guests that will take part. 
“This event takes on even more meaning for us as 2015 has marked a ’new era’ for Forte Village Resort, enabling us, more than in any other year, to surprise our guests and provide them with the exciting new revolutionary projects. 
“Let’s celebrate all together the spirit and excellence of the hotel industry!” Notes to Editors 
About World Travel Awards 
World Travel Awards celebrates its 22nd anniversary this year and is acknowledged across the globe as the ultimate travel accolade. 
The brand aims to celebrate those organisations who are pushing the boundaries of industry excellence. 
The World Travel Awards global media partner network includes International New York Times, TV5Monde, CNBC Arabiya, Outlook Traveller, Khaleej Times, TTN, Best in Travel, Breaking Travel News, and Travel Daily News International. 
World Travel Awards has a television audience of 300 million spread across 200 countries, while also reaching hundreds of thousands of print and digital readers each month through an extensive network of global media partners.
